category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_UI_LOVControl_SizingPercentage
preference.preference_description: Specifies the percentage to be used for the calculation of the threshold width for LOV Controls in the Rich client. This percentage is applied against the ScreenSize or ParentSize which is specified in the preference TC_UI_LOVComboBox_SizingBasedOn. Valid values should be between 30 and 100 (inclusive). If the specified value is outside this range, a default percentage of 70 would be used. The default value for this user preference is "70"
